agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the review and approval by the Board Education of education preparation programs in Virginia colleges and universities. This series may include, but is not limited to: college and university course catalogs, descriptions of degree programs, and accreditation information. et seq.

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the administration of teacher programs, such as the Mary V. Bicouvaris Virginia Teacher of the Year Program and the Milken Family Foundation National Educator Awards. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications for recognition programs, letters of recommendation, and evaluations.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of academic year

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: K-12 Educator Licensure: License or Statement of Eligibility Been Issued
series_description: This series documents the determination of an individualâ€™s eligibility to be issued a license, endorsements on the license, and/or a Statement of Eligibility. This series may include, but is not limited to: transcripts, course descriptions, professional licensure assessment results, and licensure applications

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: K-12 Educator Licensure: License or Statement of Eligibility Not Been Issued
series_description: This series documents determination that an individual is not eligible for a license or a Statement of Eligibility. This series may include, but is not limited to: application for licensure, transcripts, course descriptions, syllabi, and professional assessment results

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: K-12 Educator Licensure: Not Associated with Licensure Application or Licensee
series_description: This series documents submissions that cannot be associated with an educator application for licensure or statement of eligibility. This series may include, but is not limited to: transcripts, course description, syllabi, CPR card, and letter from individual regarding licensure

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: K-12 Educator Licensure: Revocation, Cancellation, Suspension, or Denial of Licenses
series_description: This series documents action taken on licensees involved in misconduct. This series may include, but is not limited to: investigative files, final orders, and findings of fact. 690 through 720

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_title: Professional Licensure Assessment Study Panel Nominees
series_description: This series documents the selection of individuals to serve on professional educator assessment study panels conducted by assessment vendors. This series may include, but is not to: applications. 22.1-298.1

agency_name: Department of Education, Central Office Operations
series_description: This series documents the financial support of students who preparing to teach in one of Virginia's critical shortage areas. This series may include, but is not limited to: student transcript, reference letters, and promissory note
